job_title: React Developer with Java and Spring Boot

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field

jd: Greetings, We have the below requirement with our Client. Kindly go through the JD below and let me know your interest. Position: React Developer with Java and Spring Boot Location: Atlanta, GA – 100% Onsite - Need Atlanta, GA candidates only Duration: 6-12+ Months Need USC, H1B & H4 EAD candidates only. LinkedIn & Passport Number Must for Submission. Need 10+ years’ experience Rate: $60/hr on c2c. Essential Skills: 6+ years of experience in React development. 5+ years of experience in Java and Spring Boot development. Strong JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3 knowledge. Experience with React hooks, Redux, and MobX. Familiarity with Java 8+, Spring Boot 2+, and Spring Security. Understanding of RESTful API principles. Experience with Agile development methodologies. Desirable Skills: Experience with TypeScript. Knowledge of GraphQL. Familiarity with Docker and containerization. Experience with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD). Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud). Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
